title: So it has been a week since Jhin's release...
body:
... where is the long lore we were promised?

I'm just curious. Is it not done yet? Are you planning some bigger event and hold it back for that? Or are you at Riot just evil evil people loving to let us wait?

replies.body: There is a short story.  It was intended to go out last week. It got held up by some region's ratings concerns, which have been resolved.  Revised version will be going to Loc teams for translations today. (But i have no idea how long it will take those teams to localize it-- -generally seems about 4 to 10 biz days depending on their current workload)
Rating concerns? Pfff is Riot now obliged to do "family friendly" lore or what? May I ask what region in specific was holding it up?
Remember that some countries have a different view on what meets certain ratings than others.  Australia is a good example of this considering how hard it is to get some video games there.
A note that, yes, Riot does have to have at least some law abiding stuff. Some splash arts for old Karthus were banned in China due to having skulls in them.
China already gets their splash arts tho. IMO if a region wants something extra they can get it, but only on their server then. As long it is only cosmetic that shouldn't be a big problem.
Can you post a line that got "censored"? Just to have at least an idea of what was the original.
Didn't know Riot was turning into another Nintendo/Disney oh wait...It's because of China isn't it?
My guess is that the great tencent overlords have spoken... I'm curious what was the reason tho...
Is this still going to be released?
My only concern is if the censorship will hurt the integrity of the story.

Ah thanks for the info.

But what about the Shen lore?Is he gonna get stuck with the short lore for now or will it also come later on?

Hey those extended Shurima bios are gunna come out soon, right?

Gunna update that Singed lore, right?
Sand is offensive in some countries so we'll never see them.
Boy, the writers really like to get brutal lately
I'm also curious. I'm a little worried that he won't have any.
You mean [this one](http://gameinfo.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/jhin/#champion-lore+)? It's on the website, because the client can't handle big lores for some reason, idk.
Nope, we were promised a short story that is less of a "history book description". It was supposed to come with his release tho...

I think they just messed up.

They should have done the Lunar Revel shyt, later, and done all the Jhin story with his release.

Poor planning on Rito's part.
